content.description:
Climb the middle of the face up to a delicate step-up onto a horizontal crack, then make a long step left to a big foothold (5.11a).

Continue up to a mantle, then follow thin holds up the left side of the slab (5.11a; touching the crack of Grain Surplus is strictly off route!) then move right and step over a bulge.

Climb up and left on slopers (5.10-) to the top.
content.protection: CDs from 2 to 3 inches for the anchor; 40-foot extendo rope useful
content.location:
This is a tricky face climb up the big slab between

Grain Surplus

and

Grain for Russia

.

climbs.name: Vorpal Sword
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Brian Sillasen & Tom Atherton, 1988

content.description: This route is on the left side of the Atlantis wall and is the slightly left-slanting crack with a distinctive diamond-shaped chockstone near the top. This climb should be on the list of the 5.8 leader or anyone else who is in this neck of the woods. Fun climbing, but as always "wish it were longer"!
content.protection: For this route you will want a set of stoppers and gear to 2.5". The route will protect well with gear to 1" and the anchor will require up to 2.5"

climbs.name: Trident
climbs.fa: Andy Schenkel and Todd Swain, Mar. 1989

content.description: easy except for a short, steep lieback crux
content.location: At the far left end of the wall

content.description: Aside from Ohm on the Range, this may be the worst route in the park. Short, fragile rock, cactus on the deck: stay away.
content.location: 75' left of Vopal Sword on a pillar. Scramble off back.

climbs.name: Grain Surplus
climbs.fa: Alan Bartlett, Todd Gordon, and Brian Sillasen, Mar. 1988

content.description: a jam and lieback; quite loose
content.location: Near the left end of the wall, with the start partly hidden by the far left end of the Minotaur Wall

climbs.name: Grain for Russia
climbs.fa: Alan Bartlett, Todd Gordon, and Brian Sillasen, Mar. 1988

content.location: The first half of this route is hidden behind the Minotaur Wall.

content.description: Climb the steep face between Grain Surplus and Vorpal Sword.
content.protection: 2 to 4 inch cams, extendo rope for anchor rig.
